s: I bought another brand and it was so sticky. These are the same old good tasting and not sticky ... When my package arrived, the boxes were damaged and 2 of them were opened with the pies coming out. I ended up throwing them in the trash and that is money lost. t: Where Can I Buy Hostess Fruit Pies: Your Ultimate Guide To Finding These Delicious Snacks (Answered!)
